CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BlackRock Core Bond Trusts BHK the Trust investment objective is to provide current income and capital appreciation. The Trust seeks to achieve its investment objective by investing at least 75% of its assets in bonds that are investment grade quality at the time of investment. The Trusts investments will include a broad range of bonds including corporate bonds US government and agency securities and mortgagerelated securities. The Trust may invest directly in such securities or synthetically through the use of derivatives.
